text: The Samurai in Autumn () is a 2016 Serbian comedy film directed by Danilo Bećković. == Cast == * Petar Strugar - Vladica * Hristina Popović - Snezana * Nikola Kojo - Miloje * Sergej Trifunović - * Andrija Milošević - Janko * Petar Novićević - Vukasin * Miodrag Krstović - Delegat * Katarina Žutić - Rada == References == == External links == * Category:2016 comedy films Category:Serbian films Category:Films set in Serbia Category:Serbian comedy films
title: The Samurai in Autumn
